segments.text: Oh man, look at that sinkâ€”water just gushing out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's right there, polishing her plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water splashing everywhere?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's spreading across the floor, soaking her shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids over there, the boy's on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies from the jar, what a brat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's egging him on, reaching up like she deserves one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is infuriating; someone's going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets are getting ruined from the water dripping down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked up, waiting to maybe crash if they fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window's open to a pretty garden, but inside it's a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe adults let this happen without paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor cabinets, all wet and damaged now.
segments.speaker: PAR
